music_id.description: The unique identifier for the music asset.

material_id.description: The unique ID assigned to the music asset.

sources.description: The list of different sources or versions available for the music asset.

author.description: The author of the music asset.

liked.description: The number of likes received by the music asset.

cover_url.description: The URL to the cover image associated with the music asset.

url.description: The URL to access or play the music asset.

duration.description: The duration of the music asset in seconds.

style.description: The style or genre of the music asset.

signature.description: The digital signature associated with the music asset.

name.description: The name or title of the music asset.

file_name.description: The file name of the music asset.

copyright.description: The copyright information related to the music asset.

create_time.description: The timestamp indicating when the music asset was created.

modify_time.description: The timestamp indicating when the music asset was last modified.
